title: Krysaliis Sterling Silver Traditional Bulge Victorian Cup - Elegant Engravable Personalized Cup Keepsake Gift - Made with Solid 925 Sterling Silver Material - Packaged in a premium gift box
features: Elegant Design -- This cup is elegant in design and the wide mouth makes it comfortable for a drink. It's a traditional design cup with a victorian handle, This cup has Bulge Shape and a stylish Victorian handle.
.925 Sterling Silver Material -- Made with Premium Quality Sterling Silver material with superb finishing, These Traditional Cups are well polished that ensure durability and Long-lasting.

Custom Engraving -- Personalize the cup with a name and add a touch of meaning. Enhanced with fine details and sturdy backing, this set is iconic. Custom gift wrapping is also available to be perfectly color coordinated for any occasion.

Safe for Sensitive Skin -- These Cups are made of the highest quality Sterling Silver that is completely safe and gentle for all skin types, even sensitive skin. It's completely hypoallergenic and nickel-free.
Lifetime Keepsake Gift -- A Flat design traditional cup crafted in sterling silver will be a memorable keepsake. Never out of style and never outdated, a traditional gift that will last a lifetime.
description: "The little one will surely adore this pretty .925 Solid Sterling Silver Bulge Victorian Baby Mini Cup by Krysaliis. The uniquely designed handle with fine details makes this Cup a perfect Newborn or Christening gift. The bulging bottom design and narrow rim adds to the splendor of the cup. Welcome the little one with this adorable Baby Cup and let them sip in Silver. This miniature cup stands at 2.5” tall, which is perfect for baby’s tiny fists. Many other Silver Baby Cups can only be displayed as decoration, but since all Krysaliis products comply with CPSC standards and come with a Certificate of Authenticity, our Cups are completely child safe, as .925 Sterling Silver is known to be a natural antiseptic and is completely safe. Personalize your Krysaliis Baby Cups even more with a custom engraving available in 3 premium styles. Add a name, date, initials, or combine the name and date to create a gift that will be truly be treasured for a lifetime. Krysaliis carefully wraps each product in a beautiful gift box to make each unboxing a truly special experience. Custom gift wrapping is also available to be perfectly color coordinated for any occasion."
